item.title: 欧洲进入冬季，天然气储量足以平息市场波动
item.description: 与许多人的预期相比，欧洲的天然气库存更加充足，市场也更加平静，从而拉开了供暖季的序幕。然而，对其能源复原力的真正考验将在未来数月到来。【原文：Europe is kicking off the heating season with fuller gas stocks and calmer markets than many expected. Yet the true test of its energy resilience will come in the months ahead.】

item.title: 印度推出一系列扩大卢比全球化的措施
item.description: 印度中央银行公布了提高卢比国际认可度的新措施，在与关税相关的贸易中断中加入了地区同行为实现货币全球化所做的努力。【原文：India’s central bank unveiled fresh steps to enhance international acceptance of the rupee, joining efforts by regional peers to globalize their currencies amid tariff-related trade disruptions.】

item.title: 印度央行提高首次公开募股贷款限额，促进新股上市
item.description: 印度的股票资本市场是全球新股上市最繁忙的市场之一，随着印度银行业监管机构放宽对参与首次公开募股的投资者的贷款规定，印度的股票资本市场得到了推动。【原文：India’s equity capital market, one of the busiest globally for new listings, got a boost as the nation’s banking regulator relaxed rules on loans to investors participating in initial public offerings.】

item.title: 高盛称放宽土地规则或将缓解美国住房紧张局面
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：US housing affordability has declined sharply over the past decade and relaxing land-use regulations could go a long way toward helping address America’s housing crunch, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc.】

item.title: 麦格理称石油面临 "惩罚性过剩"，价格将跌至 50 美元以下
item.description: 据麦格理集团（Macquarie Group）预测，随着产量的增加，石油供应将出现 "惩罚性过剩"，未来几个季度石油价格将跌至每桶 50 美元。【原文：Oil is forecast to drop into the $50s-a-barrel range in the coming quarters on expectations for “punishing oversupply” as output expands, according to Macquarie Group, which pared back price outlooks.】

item.title: 瑞士再保险公司穆勒表示，对瑞士的关税打击才刚刚开始
item.description: 瑞士再保险公司（Swiss Re AG）欧洲首席经济学家夏洛特-穆勒（Charlotte Mueller）表示，从现在开始到 2026 年，瑞士将面临包括药品在内的美国关税的影响。【原文：Switzerland will face fallout from US tariffs including on pharmaceuticals, starting now and going into 2026, according to Charlotte Mueller, European chief economist at Swiss Re AG.】

item.title: 英国国家统计局称英国房价涨幅超预期，达 0.5
item.description: 英国最大的贷款机构之一表示，由于借贷成本降低和收入增加支撑了面对潜在加税的需求，9 月份英国房价的增长超过了预期。【原文：UK house prices grew more than forecast in September, one of the country’s biggest lenders said, as lower borrowing costs and rising earnings underpinned demand in the face of potential tax rises.】

item.title: 特易购在英国食品杂货大战中的优势在反弹 40% 后成为焦点
item.description: 对于乐购公司（Tesco Plc）的投资者来说，价格战导致股价跌至九个月低点的担忧现在已成为遥远的记忆，分析师们预计，乐购的业绩将表明英国最大的杂货商正在保护自己的地盘。【原文：For Tesco Plc investors, fears of a price war that drove the shares to a nine-month low are now a distant memory, ahead of results that analysts expect will show Britain’s biggest grocer is protecting its turf.】

item.title: 英国富时 100 指数下跌，英镑上涨
政府关门加剧市场不确定性，美国期货下跌
item.description: 美国国会未能就支出计划达成一致，迫使政府陷入停摆，数十万联邦工作人员将失业在家，此后美国股票期货收跌。【原文：US equity futures held losses after Congress failed to agree to a spending plan, forcing the government into a shutdown that will keep hundreds of thousands of federal workers home from their jobs.】

item.title: 诺和诺德投资者关注阿尔茨海默氏症试验，期待一线希望
item.description: 诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）的股价在经历了又一个令人沮丧的季度后，投资者正期待着一种治疗最常见老年痴呆症的实验性疗法能帮助公司重振雄风。【原文：After another dismal quarter for Novo Nordisk A/S shares, investors are looking to an experimental treatment of the most common form of dementia to help spark a revival.】

item.title: 赞比亚财政部长表示将在年底前延长国际货币基金组织（IMF）的期限
item.description: 赞比亚正在寻求将其即将到期的国际货币基金组织计划延长 12 个月，并希望在年底前达成一项包括额外融资在内的协议。【原文：Zambia is seeking a 12-month extension of its expiring International Monetary Fund program and hopes to get a deal by year-end that includes additional financing.】

item.title: 印度央行在关税打击下仍维持利率不变
item.description: 由于美国关税给印度经济增长前景蒙上阴影，印度央行周三维持基准利率不变，同时表示未来几个月可能会放宽利率。【原文：India’s central bank left its benchmark interest rate unchanged Wednesday as US tariffs cloud the economy’s growth outlook, while signaling there may be scope to ease in coming months.】

item.title: 必和必拓斥资 5.54 亿美元提高澳大利亚铜产量
item.description: 必和必拓集团（BHP Group）将斥资 8.4 亿澳元（5.54 亿美元）加强其位于南澳大利亚的奥林匹克大坝地下铜矿项目，以提高这种关键电线金属的产量。【原文：BHP Group will spend A$840 million ($554 million) to bolster its Olympic Dam underground copper project in South Australia, as it seeks to ramp up production of the key electrical wiring metal.】

item.title: 新加坡阻止 1MDB 清算人起诉 StanChart 和 BSI 银行
item.description: 新加坡高等法院已阻止外国清算人就据称与马来西亚主权财富基金 1Malaysia Development Bhd 有关的交易起诉渣打银行和 BSI 银行有限公司。【原文：Singapore’s High Court has stopped foreign liquidators from suing Standard Chartered Plc and BSI Bank Ltd. over transactions allegedly linked to the Malaysian sovereign wealth fund 1Malaysia Development Bhd.】

item.title: 苹果否认与 OpenAI 合作损害了马斯克的 xAI
item.description: 苹果公司表示，在为其 iPhone 操作系统添加生成式人工智能时，选择与 OpenAI — 合作，而不是与埃隆-马斯克的 xAI — 合作，并没有做错什么。【原文：Apple Inc. says it did nothing wrong in choosing to partner with OpenAI — rather than Elon Musk’s xAI — when it added generative artificial intelligence to its iPhone operating system.】

item.title: 假设存在人工智能泡沫。会有什么不同？
item.description:

Investors suffered, but the internet didn’t go away after the dot-com bust.

item.title: 印度九月份俄罗斯石油进口量因美国谈判而减少
item.description: 印度从主要供应国俄罗斯的石油进口量在 9 月份有所下降，但仍保持在总进口量的三分之一左右，尽管美国力图遏制石油流入，称这有助于为莫斯科的乌克兰战争提供资金。【原文：India’s oil imports from leading supplier Russia dipped in September, but held at about a third of overall shipments in spite of a US push to curb flows it says are helping to fund Moscow’s war in Ukraine.】

item.title: 赤泽说，特朗普的 5,500 亿美元需求不会削弱日元
item.description: 日本最高贸易谈判代表赤泽亮世称，作为日美贸易协议支柱的 5500 亿美元对美投资基金不会影响货币市场。【原文：The $550 billion investment fund into the US that’s a pillar of the US-Japan trade deal won’t affect currency markets, according to Japan’s top trade negotiator Ryosei Akazawa.】

item.title: 空中客车公司的经济型客户对新型 XLR 喷气式客机感到遗憾
item.description: 空中客车公司（Airbus SE）在推销其 A321XLR 时称，该机型能以窄体飞机的经济性提供宽体喷气式飞机的功能，这对寻求扩大半径的低成本航空公司来说很有吸引力。现在，一些客户在努力发掘这些优势的同时，也表现出了悔不当初的情绪。【原文：Airbus SE marketed its A321XLR as offering widebody-jet capabilities at narrowbody economics, an attractive proposition to low-cost airlines seeking to expand their radius. Now some customers are showing buyer’s remorse as they struggle to unlock those advantages.】

item.title: 市场考虑中国禁止必和必拓货运，铁矿石价格下滑
item.description: 铁矿石下滑，因为交易商在关注中国停止矿业巨头必和必拓集团（BHP Group）新货物运输的影响。【原文：Iron ore slipped as traders watched for fallout from China’s move to halt new cargoes from mining giant BHP Group.】

item.title: Danantara 首席信息官称自由港撤资不可能是免费的
item.description: 据印尼达纳塔拉主权财富基金（Danantara sovereign wealth fund）首席投资官称，印尼与自由港麦克莫兰公司（Freeport-McMoRan Inc.【原文：Indonesia and Freeport-McMoRan Inc. have almost finalized a deal for the US miner to divest additional shares in its local unit, according to the chief investment officer of the country’s Danantara sovereign wealth fund.】

item.title: Tether 将在保守派视频平台 Rumble 上分发硬币
item.description: Tether Holdings SA将依靠保守的视频流媒体平台Rumble Inc.来帮助分发代币，以征服竞争日益激烈的美国加密货币市场。【原文：Tether Holdings SA will lean on conservative video streaming platform Rumble Inc. to help distribute tokens as it seeks to conquer an increasingly competitive US crypto market.】

item.title: 淡马锡增持上市股票，追求 "积极阿尔法
item.description: 新加坡淡马锡控股私人有限公司（Temasek Holdings Pte）首席执行官迪尔汗-皮莱（Dilhan Pillay）表示，该公司在过去 18 个月中对公共股票的投资超过了以往。【原文：Singapore’s Temasek Holdings Pte has invested more into public equities in the last 18 months than it traditionally has done, according to Chief Executive Officer Dilhan Pillay.】

item.title: 台湾拒绝美国要求半数芯片在美国制造的要求
item.description: 台湾拒绝了美国提出的将芯片生产转移到美国本土以满足美国一半需求的要求，这凸显了使双方贸易谈判复杂化的紧张局势。【原文：Taiwan has pushed back on a US request to move chip production stateside to cover half of America’s demand, underscoring the tensions complicating trade talks between the two sides.】

item.title: 全球银行为亚洲塔贷款提供的资金超过了私人信贷
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，东南亚电信塔运营商 EdgePoint Infrastructure 与一个银行财团签署了一笔 4.75 亿美元的贷款，但交易定价条件过于苛刻，不符合私人信贷基金的胃口。【原文：Southeast Asia telecom tower operator EdgePoint Infrastructure signed a $475 million loan with a consortium of banks, pricing the deal at terms too tight for the appetite of private credit funds, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 韩国、越南经受住特朗普关税考验，亚洲 PMI 指数出现分化
item.description: 上个月，亚洲制造业表现不一，韩国制造业活动有所改善，美国的主要供应国越南则保持稳定，而美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的全球贸易征税似乎影响了台湾和日本的需求。【原文：Manufacturing across Asia was split last month, with activity improved in South Korea and steady in Vietnam, a major US supplier, while President Donald Trump’s global trade levies appeared to bite into demand from Taiwan and Japan.】

item.title: 韩国将以更大预算投资喷气发动机和隐形飞机
item.description: 韩国总统李在明誓言明年将增加国防预算，投资确保先进武器和军事技术的安全，因为美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）向盟国施压，要求它们增加安全支出以减轻美国的负担。【原文：South Korean President Lee Jae Myung vowed to invest in securing advanced weaponry and military technologies with an increased defense budget next year as President Donald Trump pressures allies to raise outlays on security to reduce the burden on the US.】

item.title: 调查显示印度股市第四季度将温和上涨
item.description: 市场观察人士寄希望于与美国可能达成的贸易协议和消费税削减措施来支撑印度股市的复苏，印度股市有望从一段艰难的时期中反弹。【原文：Indian stocks are poised to rebound from a rough stretch, as market watchers pin hopes on a potential trade deal with the US and consumption tax cuts to support a recovery ahead.】
